pageContext.claim: “ABC/Washington Post Poll was the worst and most inaccurate poll of any taken prior to the 2016 Election. When my lawyers protested, they took a 12 point down and brought it to almost even by Election Day. It was a Fake Poll by two very bad and dangerous media outlets. Sad!”
pageContext.analysis: The Post-ABC poll is one of six rated "A+" by FiveThirtyEight. It correctly predicted Clinton would win the popular vote and gave Clinton a 6-point margin before the 2016 election. She won by 2 points.
